author: The Babylon Bee
description:
On a very special episode of The Babylon Bee Podcast, the gang takes a step back to examine their own whiteness with the help of Ibram X Kendi's The Antiracist Deck. We explore such topics as blackness, whiteness, and 7-Eleven.

This episode is brought to you by these sponsors:

With the dollar uncertain, go with Priority Gold: http://prioritygold.com

Get the medicine you need from people who believe in medical freedom at All Family Pharmacy: http://allfamilypharma.com/bee
title: Are You An Antiracist? | The Babylon Bee Podcast
